description: Provide instant access to SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS documentation along with ready-to-use Svelte component snippets styled with Tailwind. Enable efficient UI development by retrieving relevant docs, utility class info, and component code snippets on demand. Streamline your frontend workflow with organized content discovery and configurable documentation scraping.

tools.name: get_sveltekit_doc
tools.title: Get SvelteKit Doc
tools.description: Get SvelteKit documentation for a specific topic.

topic.description: The documentation topic (e.g., 'routing', 'hooks'). Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and dots allowed.

tools.name: get_tailwind_info
tools.title: Get Tailwind Info
tools.description: Get Tailwind CSS information for a specific query.

query.description: The Tailwind CSS class or concept. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and dots allowed.

tools.name: get_component_snippet
tools.title: Get Component Snippet
tools.description: Get a Svelte component code snippet for a specific UI element.

snippet_name.description: The name of the specific snippet. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and dots allowed.

component_category.description: The category of the component. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and dots allowed.

tools.name: list_tailwind_info_topics
tools.title: List Tailwind Info Topics
tools.description: Lists available Tailwind CSS documentation topics.

tools.name: list_snippets_in_category
tools.title: List Snippets In Category
tools.description: Lists available snippets within a specified category.

category.description: The category name to list snippets for. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and dots allowed.
